title: Kids Games
subtitle: Fantasy and Imagination
graduationproject: Graduation Project. Developed by Alexey Volosevch Group 44TP Minsk State College of Digital Technologies, 2023
chessdesc: Chess is a game played between two opponents on opposite sides of a board containing 64 squares of alternating colors. Each player has 16 pieces: 1 king, 1 queen, 2 rooks, 2 bishops, 2 knights, and 8 pawns.
chessgoal: The goal of the game is to checkmate the other king. Checkmate happens when the king is in a position to be captured (in check) and cannot escape from capture.
